title: Pixel Promotion
content: I had bought the Pixel 5 back at launch date and met the criteria for qualifying for a Bose Headset. Since launch back in October, my claim hasn't been validated, I have called the promotions support team and they keep saying they have no date as to when they will be able to validate the claim. They seem to have a technical issue with validating claims. It is now coming up to 2 months and  I have still have no update and no headphones? What should I do?
